snippet.title: Welcome to Minecraft: Education Edition
snippet.description:
Minecraft: Education Edition is a game-based learning platform that promotes creativity, collaboration and problem-solving in an immersive digital environment.  Educators around the world use Minecraft: Education Edition to engage students across subjects and bring abstract concepts to life in remote, hybrid and in-person learning environments. With hundreds of standards-aligned lessons and STEM curricula, classroom-friendly features, tutorials and challenges, educators can access everything they need to get started with no experience required.

Visit education.minecraft.net to learn more and get started with Minecraft: Education Edition!

Follow @PlayCraftLearn on Twitter and Facebook to connect to our global community.
